scripts.db:reset: docker exec news-mining-db psql -U newsletter -d postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS newsletter_mining;' && docker exec news-mining-db psql -U newsletter -d postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE newsletter_mining;' && npm run db:migrate && npm run auth:migrate
scripts.test:credits:prepare-db: docker exec news-mining-db psql -U newsletter -d postgres -tc "SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname='newsletter_mining_test'" | grep -q 1 || docker exec news-mining-db psql -U newsletter -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE newsletter_mining_test;"
scripts.test:credits: npm run test:credits:prepare-db && DATABASE_URL=postgresql://newsletter:newsletter_dev@localhost:5432/newsletter_mining_test npm run db:migrate && DATABASE_URL=postgresql://newsletter:newsletter_dev@localhost:5432/newsletter_mining_test vitest run server/services/credits.test.ts
